pr_title: Add minor fixes to language server

timeline.message: disable ast API in language server

timeline.bodyText: Would be better to move this to a constant
timeline.author: SupunS

replies.bodyText: +1. Sorting API is finalising and yes, all such check will be done against to a set of constants.
replies.author: nadeeshaan

timeline.bodyText: @nadeeshaan is this intentional? we are commenting extension service method, wouldn't this affect the other external teams?
timeline.author: rasika

replies.bodyText: Yes, this API is not effectively used by the other extension clients and since they have to migrate to the latest ProjectAPI this will not be working on top of the old LSCompiler. Hence we disabled this to avoid unnecessary NPEs thrown
replies.author: nadeeshaan
